subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Playing with understandable desperation, the Sharks forced the action in Chicago’s end all evening, but Dustin Byfuglien’s overtime goal put the Blackhawks one win away from the Stanley Cup finals.
snippet: Playing with understandable desperation, the Sharks forced the action in Chicago’s end all evening, but Dustin Byfuglien’s overtime goal put the Blackhawks one win away from the Stanley Cup finals.
